attributes.action: lobby the European Union to change the current ruling that workers are entitled only to the same pay and conditions that they would be entitled to in their own country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems to me that this is blatant discrimination against these workers; surely there can be NO QUESTION AT ALL that EVERYONE doing a specific job is entitled to the same pay and conditions as everyone else.  The cost of living is the same for everyone living in this country; why, therefore, should anyone be expected to accept a lower standard of living just because he/she is not a British citizen?  This situation is also a very potent factor in the current (Jan/Feb 2009) furore over jobs in power stations, etc., not being offered to British workers.
